creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: blue lined back with black side edging; front--applied batik neck band; edged in red; orange and white frog closures; center fronts have heavy cross stitch embroidery on applied red background; wide lower beige area--plain; shoulders and sleeves have applied batik in circle patterns; back--upper circles in square pattern batik; long lower back heavily embroidered--yellow, red, black--separated by applied horizontal bands; front is vented and tapered
title: Jacket
